bibl.title: Identifying the Oil Used in the Rituals in the Temple of Tutu.
bibl.note: Olive oil was the most probable oil to have been used.

bibl.title: Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons

bibl.seg: ROSS Andrew, Identifying the Oil Used in the Rituals in the Temple of Tutu.

Colin A. HOPE and Gillian E. BOWEN (Edd.), Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 11 (Oxford - Oakville, Connecticut, 2002) pp. 263-267, 3 tabl.
Olive oil was the most probable oil to have been used.
